titles.title: When a man loves the Lord he loves mercy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When a man loves the Lord he loves mercy
When a man loves the Lord he gives grace
He is generous and kind
He is peaceful of mind
When a man truly loves the Lord
When a man loves the Lord he acts justly
When a man loves the Lord he is fair
His compassion flows free for the poor and the weak
When a man truly loves the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to be more like Jesus
Show me where I should begin
Teach me to pray and to walk in His ways
And to turn my back on all my sin

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When a man loves the Lord he walks humbly
When a man loves the Lord he is meek
He is willing to die to his old sinful pride
When a man truly loves the Lord
